CustomField.formula: CASE ( Key__c , 'B', 'Product is standard on aircraft', 'U', 'Upgrade of standard product available', 'N', 'Equipment has been certified and installed on aircraft or is an OEM option on the aircraft', 'S', 'Potential to certify and install equipment on aircraft', 'L', 'Currently no potential to certify and install equipment on aircraft or product is not applicable to aircraft', 'Other' )
CustomField.label: Key Description
